name: Eligibility for benefits
text: §392-25  Eligibility for benefits.  An individual is eligible to receive temporary disability benefits if the individual has been in employment for at least fourteen weeks during each of which the individual has received remuneration in any form for twenty or more hours and earned wages of at least $400, during the fifty-two weeks immediately preceding the first day of disability. [L 1969, c 148, pt of §1; gen ch 1985; am L 1999, c 30, §1]
